Author: felix_white_law_12319
Content:
This is one of my personal questions that I wanted to ask even though this was controversial.

The most interesting here is Indonesia as a muslim majority state has a small case of Islamofobia, it was common through Internet and in extreme cases into bullying.

However the patterns and justification that I saw here is against social domination that is dominated by muslims and it became normal towards rural Indonesian society (from freedom of religion and religious tolerance)


What is your opinion towards this?
Drop your opinions here because some voices could inspire the masses

Author: gomakudon
Content: People are entitled to their own opinions, but often it springs out because of collective personal trauma in the past.

Author: gomakudon
Content: No matter what we explain to those people, they will not budge one inch on their opinion

Author: gomakudon
Content: Also unfortunately, there are people who should've never met each other, in any aspect of life. Live and let live saja lah.
